content.text:
# Draft:List of Historical Figures of Japan every Wikipedia should have

List prominent figures related to Japan that should be included in all language editions.
Provide a minimum 400-character description for each figure.
Include birth and death years, birthplace, place of death, grave (if known), portrait (if available), and a description of their representative achievements.
If possible, cite one basic reference work or biography.
The initial goal is to list at least five representative figures per historical period.
High-priority items are in bold.
